tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE air_pollution_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name STRING,
    latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    pollution_level DOUBLE PRECISION
)

CREATE TABLE AirQualityMonitors (
   monitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   location_name VARCHAR(255),
   latitude DECIMAL,
   longitude DECIMAL,
   air_quality_index INT
);

CREATE TABLE PollutionData (
   data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   monitor_id INT,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   pollutant_type VARCHAR(50),
   pollutant_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Air_Pollution_Data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id INT NOT NULL,
    pollution_level INT NOT NULL,
    measurement_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES Monitoring_Stations(station_id)
);
